metadata.title: CVE-2018-12293 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The getImageData function in the ImageBufferCairo class inWebCore/platform/graphics/cairo/ImageBufferCairo.cpp in WebKit, as used inWebKitGTK+ prior to version 2.20.3 and WPE WebKit prior to version 2.20.1,is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow triggered by an integeroverflow, which could be abused by crafted HTML content.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
